meta.content: East Hollywood is a free public charter high school with a full film curriculum and free credit recovery program. Creativity and individuality are valued. Teachers and staff work diligently to help each individual student succeed.

font.strong: East Hollywood is a fully accredited free public charter high school.

strong.font: Students graduating from EHHS earn a Utah High School Diploma.

div.font:
​NOW ENROLLING current and new students for the 2020-2021 school year
All enrollment for Current and New students is done online through the "ENROLL" link above
ALL NEW Students will remain pending enrollment until we obtain a copy of a Birth Certificate and Immunization records. Once we have those your students spot will officially be held for the upcoming school year.
Documents can be emailed to cdumas@ehhs.us or brought in to the front office during business hours. If you have questions please contact Chelsie at the above email address. ​

div.br:
​ Sign-up to receive school alerts via text message
text @ehhsin to (860) 566-9880
